Major_Arcs.title: Nan's Saloon Lament and the Ghost Town Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Nan and her disillusionment in a saloon setting, juxtaposed with the looming threat to a nearby ghost town from modern development.

sub_scenes.title: Saloon Disillusionment
sub_scenes.description: Nan expresses her disappointment with her current life in a saloon, contrasting her dreams with reality and engaging in a skeptical conversation with a man.

sub_scenes.title: Ghost Town's Impending Demise
sub_scenes.description: The scene shifts to a ghost town where men discuss plans to build an airport, much to Nan's distress.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at the Ghost Town and Development Plans

Major_Arcs.title: Nan and Cal's Conflicted Romance Amidst Demolition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the evolving relationship between Nan and Cal, set against the backdrop of the ghost town's demolition.

sub_scenes.title: Misjudgment and Questioning of Love
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal discuss their romantic feelings, misunderstandings, and the nature of love in a changing landscape.

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation at the Demolition Site
sub_scenes.description: The scene shifts to the demolition site where Nan confronts the workers, expressing her distress and resistance to the destruction.

Major_Arcs.title: Family Conflict and Nan's Defiance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Nan's conflict with her father over her involvement with the ghost town and construction, leading to emotional distress and paternal reprimand.

sub_scenes.title: Business Interruption and Horse Assistance
sub_scenes.description: Nan interrupts her father's business meeting to discuss horses for construction, but faces dismissal and resistance.

sub_scenes.title: Humiliation and Motherly Comfort
sub_scenes.description: Nan retreats to her room, feeling humiliated, and is comforted by a maid, then her mother, who offers advice on love and relationships.

Major_Arcs.title: Nan's Pursuit of Clarity and Father's Business Directive
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Nan's decision to seek clarity from Cal, her active pursuit, and interruption by her father's business orders.

sub_scenes.title: Decision and Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Nan resolves to confront Cal and actively seeks him out to understand their relationship.

narrative_arcs.title: Decision to Seek Clarity from Cal

sub_scenes.title: Business Interruption and Father's Command
sub_scenes.description: Nan's pursuit is halted by her father who gives her business instructions regarding horses and a deal.

Major_Arcs.title: Escalating Conflict with Cal and Emotional Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the escalating conflict between Nan and Cal regarding their relationship and business matters, leading to their separation and Nan's loneliness, followed by Cal's return and confession.

sub_scenes.title: Ultimatum and Defiance
sub_scenes.description: Nan confronts Cal, giving him an ultimatum which he defiantly rejects, choosing to follow her father's orders.

narrative_arcs.title: Nan's Loneliness and Reflection on Cal's Absence

Major_Arcs.title: Severe Weather Crisis and Community Response
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts focus to a severe snowstorm threatening the community, depicting the worry, the arrival of aid, and Cal's resolve to help.

sub_scenes.title: Weather Concerns and Reports
sub_scenes.description: Nan and Cal discuss the dire weather conditions, followed by reports from Mr. Wills about the severity of the snowstorm.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Mr. Wills' and Weather Report
Historical Context of Severe Snow and Impending Starvation
Cal's Resolve to Save the Cattle

sub_scenes.title: Hope Amidst Hopelessness
sub_scenes.description: Characters express despair over the continuous snow, but a glimmer of hope emerges with the sound of a plane, which is revealed to be delivering fodder.

narrative_arcs.title: Sound of a Plane and Hopeful Discovery
Fodder from the Plane and Seeds of Romance

Major_Arcs.title: Town Drama and Jeff's Hero Worship
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc shifts to town drama, introducing Chane Benson and focusing on Jeff's fascination with guns and violent figures, contrasted with Sally's concerns.

sub_scenes.title: Chane Benson's Showdown and Town Reaction
sub_scenes.description: Chane Benson's violent act in town sparks varied reactions and introduces Jeff's admiration for such figures.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane Benson's Showdown and Town Reactions

sub_scenes.title: Sally and Clyde's Concerns about Jeff
sub_scenes.description: Sally and Clyde discuss Jeff's hero worship, his focus on guns, and Sally's growing worries about his behavior.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally's Reflection on Jeff's Youth and Clyde's Commentary
Jeff's Defensive Outburst and Clyde Insult

sub_scenes.title: Sally's Deepening Fear and Flashback
sub_scenes.description: Sally expresses her escalating fear to Clyde, recalling a past incident that highlights Jeff's troubled behavior and introduces Mr. Benson's ominous influence.

narrative_arcs.title: Sally and Clyde's Worries About Jeff's Behavior
Sally's Flashback of Jeff's Troubling Past
Introduction to Mr. Benson and Ominous Advice

Major_Arcs.title: Article Controversy and Benson's Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around the controversy caused by Clyde's article about Benson, Sally's fear for Clyde, and Benson's calculated response.

sub_scenes.title: Article's Repercussions and Sally's Fear
sub_scenes.description: Clyde faces angry reactions to his article, and Sally expresses her fear for his safety due to Benson's potential violence.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinner Deception and Violent Confrontation
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the dinner invitation to Benson, the escalating tensions, and the violent confrontation that ensues.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner and False Courtesies
sub_scenes.description: The dinner with Benson starts with polite exchanges, but underlying tensions quickly surface.

sub_scenes.title: Aftermath and Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Sally reveals Benson is her brother, triggering Jeff's confrontation with Benson and subsequent pursuit to save Clyde.

narrative_arcs.title: Chane's Threat and Assertion of Dominance
Sally's Rage, Chane's Departure, and Warning about Clyde
Jeff's Determined Pursuit to Save Clyde
Confrontation and Er's Plea for Restraint

Major_Arcs.title: Resolution of Benson Conflict and Newspaper Aftermath
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc concludes the conflict with Benson through a fistfight and shows the aftermath in the newspaper office.

sub_scenes.title: Fistfight and Headline Change
sub_scenes.description: Jeff and Benson resolve their conflict with a fistfight, and Sally changes the newspaper headline to reflect Benson's departure.

narrative_arcs.title: Jeff's Explanation to Sis about Clyde
Sally and Clyde's Conversation about Headline Change
Office Discussion: Newspaper Edition and Lessons Learned

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Conflict and Introduction of Steve Daley
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new ranch conflict and the character of Steve Daley, setting up new tensions and power dynamics.

sub_scenes.title: Whip Fight and Daley's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: A whip fight occurs, followed by the introduction of Steve Daley as the new 'boss'.

narrative_arcs.title: Discussion about Betsy's Job and Trouble

Major_Arcs.title: Betsy and Steve's Initial Interactions and Range War Threat
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the initial tense interactions between Betsy and Steve and introduces the threat of a range war.

sub_scenes.title: Sarcasm and Warning
sub_scenes.description: Betsy and Steve engage in sarcastic exchanges, and Hank warns Betsy about a potential range war.

narrative_arcs.title: Offer of a Ride and Polite Refusal

Major_Arcs.title: Confrontation with Bridges and Betsy's Decision about Steve
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the escalating conflict with Fred Bridges and Betsy's realization and decision regarding Steve Daley's role.

sub_scenes.title: Street Confrontation and Fight
sub_scenes.description: Betsy is confronted by Fred Bridges, leading to a verbal and physical altercation.

narrative_arcs.title: Confrontation with Fred Bridges and Fight

sub_scenes.title: Betsy's Realization and Decision
sub_scenes.description: Betsy realizes Steve is a hired gunman and decides to keep him, despite initial thoughts of firing him.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Realization and Decision about Steve Daley
Betsy's Change of Heart Regarding Firing Steve
Hank's Gratitude and Betsy's Suggestion for Personal Thanks

Major_Arcs.title: Romantic Tension and Steve's Gunfighter Dilemma
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the burgeoning romance between Betsy and Steve, complicated by Steve's identity as a gunfighter.

sub_scenes.title: Condition and Confession
sub_scenes.description: Betsy sets a condition for Steve's job, leading to a confession and a shift in their dynamic.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Conflicted Feelings about Steve's Gunslinger Identity
Declaration of Love and the Dilemma of Steve's Identity
Steve's Stance and Betsy's Plea for Love
Betsy's Unconditional Love and Steve's Wavering Resolve

Major_Arcs.title: New Ranch Conflict and Betsy's Assertiveness
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces a new conflict at the ranch, showcasing Betsy's assertive nature and determination to protect her land.

sub_scenes.title: Impending Trouble and Confrontation
sub_scenes.description: Trouble arises, leading to Betsy confronting Steve and 'Yuh, Betsy!' regarding land disputes and asserting her authority.

narrative_arcs.title: Reflection on Past Conflict and Gunfighter Identity

Major_Arcs.title: Action and Resolution at Devil's Pass
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the escalating conflict leading to Devil's Pass, the violent confrontation, and ultimate resolution and reunion.

sub_scenes.title: Hank's Resolve and Journey
sub_scenes.description: Hank resolves to take action, and Betsy and Steve journey to Devil's Pass, anticipating conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: Betsy's Justification and Steve's Reluctant Agreement
The Silent Journey and Cessation of Gunfire
Arrival at Devil's Pass and Accusation

Major_Arcs.title: Ranch Romance and New Range Conflict
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc transitions to a ranch setting, introducing new romantic interests and a territorial conflict over range land.

sub_scenes.title: Ranch Argument and Curley's Arrival
sub_scenes.description: A personal argument occurs at the ranch, followed by Curley's arrival and news of range trouble.

sub_scenes.title: Fence Line Confrontation and Resolution
sub_scenes.description: Ranchers confront Fred Gordon about a fence, leading to escalating tension and eventual resolution through the Rancher's daughter's assertive intervention.

narrative_arcs.title: Apologies and Reassurance After the Confrontation

Major_Arcs.title: Broken Engagement and Carrie's Victory
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details the breakdown of Carrie's engagement with Fred Gordon due to his selfish motives and her subsequent victory in business.

sub_scenes.title: Accusations and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Carrie and Dave confront Fred, leading to Carrie's assertive rejection of Fred after discovering his manipulative intentions.

narrative_arcs.title: Dave's Support and Carrie's Confession of Love
Reflections on Past Misunderstandings and a Romantic Proposal
Fred's Strategic Proposition and Carrie's Initial Reaction
The Unveiling of Fred's Selfish Motives and Carrie's Betrayal
Carrie's Angry Confrontation and Rejection of Fred
The Confrontation with Fred and Dave's Unexpected Arrival

Major_Arcs.title: Carrie and Dave's Uncertain Romance and Confession
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts the uncertain romance between Carrie and Dave after her broken engagement, leading to emotional confessions and a potential shift in their relationship.

sub_scenes.title: Rejection and Town Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Carrie rejects Fred and encounters Dave in town weeks later, initiating a tense and emotional conversation.

sub_scenes.title: Illness and Love Confession
sub_scenes.description: Carrie falls ill, leading to Dave's concern and her eventual confession of love for Fred to Dave.

narrative_arcs.title: Carlton's Account of Fred's Visit and Carrie's Rejection
Dave's Interrogation and Carrie's Love Confession
Dave's Pragmatic Advice and Carrie's Emotional Turmoil
Dave's Persuasion and Carrie's Plea for Affection

Major_Arcs.title: Dirk's Injury, Capture, and Chris's Love for Rance
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces Dirk's injury, his capture by the Marshal, and Chris's developing love for Rance amidst the conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Dirk's Injury and Pursuit
sub_scenes.description: Dirk's arrival and cryptic words reveal he's injured, confirmed later as a bullet wound, and they are being pursued.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival and Questioning at the Ranch

sub_scenes.title: Law vs Justice and Compromise
sub_scenes.description: Rance and Chris debate law versus justice, leading to Rance compromising and allowing Chris to care for Dirk, during which Chris develops feelings for Dirk.

narrative_arcs.title: Shift in Stance and Temporary Truce
Evolving Relationship - Night Encounter and Recognition

Major_Arcs.title: Escape, Confrontation, and Conflicting Loyalties
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts Dirk and Chris's escape attempt, their confrontation with the Marshal, and Chris's conflicting loyalties between Dirk and Rance.

sub_scenes.title: Pursuit and Gunfight
sub_scenes.description: Dirk and Chris realize they are being pursued, leading to a confrontation with the Marshal and a gunfight where Chris is injured.

narrative_arcs.title: Retrospective on Evasion Attempts and the Marshal's Ambush
Decision to Leave the Marshal and Reflection

Major_Arcs.title: Rance's Recovery, Proposal, and Wedding Day
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Rance's recovery, the development of romance between Rance and Chris, and their wedding day, despite lingering tensions.

sub_scenes.title: Recovery and Love Confession
sub_scenes.description: Rance is found unconscious and recovers under Chris's care, leading to mutual confessions of love and a marriage proposal.

narrative_arcs.title: Confession of Love and Proposal Tease

sub_scenes.title: Wedding Day and Dirk's Interruption
sub_scenes.description: The wedding day arrives, filled with the bride's anxieties, and is dramatically interrupted by Dirk's unexpected arrival.

narrative_arcs.title: Walking Down the Aisle and Dirk's Arrival
Marshal's Wedding Gift and Dirk's Fate
Final Remarks on Dirk and Rance's Taste
